title: Girls Love
description:
The new incarnation of Yuri Hime Wildrose anthology, a collection of not-safe-for-work yuri one-shots.

[b]Volume 1: Girls Love[/b]
[list][*]Balance-Lee of Love! - Rokuroichi
[*]Pure Heart Playgirl - Asagi Shinobu 
[*]Himitsu Dakedo Ne
[*]Full of Memories - Morishima Akiko
[*][url=https://mangadex.org/title/13019]Everyday Lingerie[/url] - Kodama Naoko
[*]Dream at Dawn - Amano Shuninta
[*]Sweet Tears - Saida Nika
[*]Hitohira no Hanabira
[*]Girls Love[/list]
[b]Volume 2: Girls Love -Strawberry Milkshake-[/b]
[list][*]Sougo Hoshoku Relation - Nanzaki Iku
[*]Drip - Amano Shuninta
[*] After School Canon - Mikuni Hajime
[*][url=https://mangadex.org/title/13019]Summer Splash[/url] - Kodama Naoko
[*]Suki? Daisuki? Aishiteru - Niwaka Yuan
[*]Koiwazurai no Naoshikata - Pierre Yamamoto
[*]Sweet Emotion - Asatsuki Shinobu[/list]
